response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value for you. This item, tailored to your specific needs and interests, is worth $1,000,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This represents an outstanding investment that could greatly enhance your life or business. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction.", "product_price": 900000}
